channel.title: AMS Council Agenda Feed
channel.description: A feed that parses the agendas for AMS Council

item.title: Council Agenda – April 9, 2025
item.content:encoded:
AMS Council - April 9, 2025

Alma Mater Society of UBC Vancouver

Wednesday, April 9, 2025 at 6:00 PM PDT to Wednesday, April 9, 2025 at 11:00 PM

PDT

Michael Kingsmill Forum + Zoom for Councillors (must be pre-arranged with the President): https://ubc.zoom.us/j/61361551422?pwd=WDhIblhkNEVEcFIyT1lsMjhBc0tSQT09

Meeting Details: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/61361551422?pwd=WDhIblhkNEVEcFIyT1lsMjhBc0tSQT09

Agenda

I. Call to Order 6:00 PM

II. Territorial Acknowledgement 6:10 PM

III. Membership and Attendance: Introductions, New Members, Declaration of Vacancies6:12 PM

A. New Members

Gagan Parmar - VP Finance

Solomon Yi-Kieran - VP External Affairs

Jasper Lorien - Board of Governors

Cade Desjarlais - Board of Governors

B. Vacancies

GSS, Medicine

C. Goodbyes

Amber Dhaliwal - VP Finance

Eshana Bhangu (as Board of Governors Rep)

Kamil Kanji (as Board of Governors Rep)

IV. Speaker's Business and Remarks 6:13 PM

V. Statements from Students-at-Large 6:18 PM

Statement from student-at-large - 3 minutes

Response from Councillors - 3 minutes

Closing remarks from student-at-large - 1 minute

Up to three students at large may address Council.

VI. Approval of Minutes of Council and Committees

BE IT RESOLVED THAT the following minutes be accepted as presented:

AMS Council minutes dated January 15, 2025

VII. Consent Items

A. Consent Items Requiring a Simple Majority

B. Consent Items Requiring a Two-Thirds Majority

1. Code Change 2025: A Cappella Club

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council adopt the report from the Governance Committee entitled Code Changes 2025: A Cappella Club' and thus amend the Code as recommended."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

2. Hours Change for Financial Coordinator

WHEREAS the Financial Coordinator position is currently vacant and has been vacant as of March 27th, as the former holder of the position has been elected Vice-President,

Finance

WHEREAS the vacant Financial Coordinator position will not be filled until the start of the next fiscal year

BE IT RESOLVED THAT the hours of Naton Ting, Associate Vice President Finance, be raised to 25 hours/week, effective retroactively from March 31st until April 30th to accommodate for increased workload

VIII. Presentations and Accompanying Motions

IX. Executive and Committee Motions

A. Finance Committee Chair Vacancy

BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT: (executive or non executive voting member of Council) be appointed Chair of the Finance Committee for a period effective immediately and ending at the first Council meeting in May 2025

X. Constituency and Affiliate Motions

XI. Discussions and Consultation

A. Code Change 2025: Vice-President Student Life and Executive

Presenter: C K

Change will be uploaded by EoD Monday after an e-vote of Governance Committee

XII. President's Business and Remarks 6:39 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 5 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XIII. Executive Business and Remarks

A. VP Academic & University Affairs 6:44 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. VP Administration 6:47 PM

Presenter: Amy Liao (she/her/hers)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. VP External Affairs 6:50 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. VP Finance 6:53 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. Managing Director 6:56 PM

Presenter: Justin Lieu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Senior Manager Student Services 6:59 PM

Presenter: Kathleen Simpson

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XIV. Committee Reports (3 minutes each)

A. Advocacy Committee 7:02 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. Finance Committee 7:05 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. Operations Committee 7:08 PM

Presenter: Amy Liao (she/her/hers)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. Governance Committee 7:11 PM

Presenter: Eshana Bhangu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. Human Resources Committee 7:14 PM

Presenter: Cameron Taylor

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Student Life Committee 7:17 PM

Presenter: Cameron Taylor

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Executive Performance and Accountability Committee (EPA) 7:20 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

H. Advisory Board 7:23 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XV. Report from Presidents' Council 7:26 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVI. Board of Governors, Senate, & Ombudsperson Reports

A. Board of Governors

Presenters: Eshana Bhangu, Kamil Kanji

B. Senate

Presenters: Jasper Lorien, Jacky Xue

C. Ombudsperson

XVII. Historical Update 7:29 PM

Presenter: Sheldon Goldfarb

XVIII. Other Business, Including In Camera Discussions, Notices of Motions and Submissions

A. Interim Vice-President Student Life Appointment

Presenter: C K

B. Council Appointed Position Hiring

Presenter: Cameron Taylor

C. April EPA Session

XIX. Next Meeting and Adjournment

Next Council meeting time and date: 6:00 pm on April 23, 2025.

Supporting Documents

  • Senior Manager of Student Services’ Updates to Council
